StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramDataByNwaID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NWA_ID int ) AS
SELECT pa.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, n.NWA_ID, p.PROGRAM_ID, p.PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION, p.PROGRAM_TYPE, n.DUTY_PREFERENCE1, n.DUTY_PREFERENCE2, n.DUTY_PREFERENCE3, pa.PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE FROM dbo.NWA n WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY pa ON n.NWA_ID = pa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN dbo.PROGRAM p ON pa.PROGRAM_ID = p.PROGRAM_ID WHERE n.NWA_ID = @NWA_ID
